name: Bichromatic
description:
In this platformer game, you play as a cube in a world with TWO colors. You can switch between platforms corresponding to each color.

The goal is to get in the exit door.

Sometimes you will have to THINK about a way to find the exit.

Sometimes, you will have to "die and RETRY" over and over to finish a level

This game has actually 3 levels (A tutorial and 2 normal levels).

More level are planned to be added within future updates.

If you have a feedback, please leave a comment.

Have a nice day.
